ground_truth: A square of his chest is bare beneath a sheet as Emily is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney. Dr. Briar comes to see her in an operating room, and Dan weeps. A surgeon lifts Tim's heart out of his body and carefully passes it to a colleague. Dr. Briar and her colleagues are operating on Emily as a medic opens the door of the operating room to let in another medic who is carrying Tim's heart in a stainless steel bowl. Emily, anesthetized and wearing a theater cap, lies on the operating table. There is a golden, dream-like image of Emily and Tim sitting in the shade of the tree and entwining their fingers. Emily's new heart lies still in the open cavity of her chest while Dr. Briar looks up at the monitor, which is flat-lining. The heart begins to beat, and Emily lies peacefully on the operating table, eyes closed. The real Ben sits miserably in Tim's motel room, staring at a wall of newspaper cuttings about the crash. There are also photos of the people Tim helped and an article on Ezra. Ben sifts through envelopes, each of which has the name of a person Tim wanted to help, including Ben's. Ben hands Emily a list of the people written on the back of a photo of Sarah and a photo showing Tim standing at Holly's hospital bedside. In her garden, Emily weeps as she reads Tim's letter to her. Glum and pensive, Emily lies in a bathtub, and her head and shoulders are framed by the water. Emily slowly submerges herself so that her ears are beneath the water and lies with her eyes closed, listening. Wearing a delicate summer dress, Emily walks in a sunny park and approaches a children's choir singing in the open to an audience of adults who clap along. Ezra is playing the piano, and Emily watches and looks moved. When the songs ended, Ezra points the audience's standing applause towards the choir and rises, bows, then gestures to the choir again. Emily watches intensely through wide, gentle eyes and cranes her neck to keep track of Ezra as he leaves the stage and moves effortlessly towards members of the audience. Emily walks over to Ezra as he chats to some of the children in passing. He turns to her confidently; he's no longer blind. Emily shakes her head, her eyes begin to fill with tears and glisten. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes. He smiles gently, and Emily smiles through her tears, which roll down her cheeks. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand, and another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: A quadrilateral of his torso is uncovered underneath a blanket as Emily is wheeled along a medical hallway on a stretcher. Dr. Briar arrives to visit her in a surgical chamber, and Dan sobs. A physician elevates Tim's cardiac organ from his form and cautiously hands it to a coworker. Dr. Briar and her coworkers are operating on Emily as a paramedic opens the entrance of the surgical chamber to admit another paramedic who is holding Tim's cardiac organ in a metallic container. Emily, sedated and wearing a surgical cap, reclines on the surgical table. There is a golden, dream-like vision of Emily and Tim sitting in the shadow of the tree and interlacing their digits. Emily's new cardiac organ lies motionless in the open cavity of her torso while Dr. Briar glances up at the display, which is flat-lining. The cardiac organ starts to pulsate, and Emily reclines serenely on the surgical table, eyes shut. The actual Ben sits despondently in Tim's motel accommodation, gazing at a wall of newspaper clippings about the collision. There are also images of the individuals Tim assisted and a piece on Ezra. Ben sifts through packages, each of which has the name of a person Tim wished to aid, including Ben's. Ben hands Emily a listing of the individuals inscribed on the reverse of a portrait of Sarah and a picture showing Tim standing at Holly's hospital bedside. In her orchard, Emily sobs as she peruses Tim's note to her. Despondent and contemplative, Emily reclines in a bathtub, and her head and shoulders are bordered by the liquid. Emily gradually immerses herself so that her ears are beneath the liquid and reclines with her eyes shut, listening. Wearing a delicate summer gown, Emily strolls in a sunny park and approaches a children's chorus singing in the open to an audience of grown-ups who clap along. Ezra is playing the keyboard, and Emily observes and appears moved. When the melodies concluded, Ezra directs the audience's standing ovation towards the chorus and rises, bows, then gestures to the chorus again. Emily observes intently through wide, gentle eyes and stretches her neck to keep track of Ezra as he exits the platform and moves effortlessly towards members of the audience. Emily walks over to Ezra as he chats to some of the children in passing. He turns to her confidently; he's no longer sightless. Emily shakes her head, her eyes begin to fill with tears and glisten. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes. He smiles gently, and Emily grins through her tears, which roll down her cheeks. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand, and another large tear rolls down Emily's cheek.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: A square of his chest is bare beneath a sheet as Emily is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney. Emily is seen by Dr. Briar in an operating room, and Dan weeps. Tim's heart is lifted out of his body by a surgeon, who carefully passes it to a colleague. Emily is operated on by Dr. Briar and her colleagues as a medic opens the door of the operating room to let in another medic carrying Tim's heart in a stainless steel bowl. Anesthetized and wearing a theater cap, Emily lies on the operating table. A golden, dream-like image shows Emily and Tim sitting in the shade of the tree and entwining their fingers. Emily's new heart, while Dr. Briar looks up at the monitor, lies still in the open cavity of her chest, which is flat-lining. The heart begins to beat, and Emily, eyes closed, is lying peacefully on the operating table. Ben sits miserably in Tim's motel room, staring at a wall of newspaper cuttings about the crash. Photos of the people Tim helped and an article on Ezra are also there. Ben sifts through envelopes, each of which contains the name of a person Tim wanted to help, including Ben's. A list of the people, written on the back of a photo of Sarah and a photo showing Tim standing at Holly's hospital bedside, is handed to Emily by Ben. Tim's letter to her is read by Emily in her garden, and she weeps. In a bathtub, Emily lies glum and pensive, her head and shoulders framed by the water. Emily slowly submerges herself so that her ears are beneath the water and lies with her eyes closed, listening. Wearing a delicate summer dress, Emily walks in a sunny park and approaches a children's choir that sings in the open to an audience of adults who clap along. The piano is played by Ezra, and he is watched by Emily, who looks moved. When the songs ended, Ezra points the standing applause of the audience towards the choir and rises, bows, then gestures to the choir again. Through wide, gentle eyes, Emily intensely watches and cranes her neck to keep track of Ezra as he leaves the stage and moves effortlessly towards members of the audience. Ezra is walked over to by Emily as he chats to some of the children in passing. She turns to him confidently; she is no longer blind. Ezra shakes his head, his eyes begin to fill with tears and glisten. Ezra nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Emily's eyes. She smiles gently, and Ezra smiles through his tears, which roll down his cheeks. Emily gazes at him incredulously and shakes his hand, and another big tear rolls down Ezra's cheek.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Emily is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney, a square of her chest bare beneath a sheet. Dr. Briar visits her in an operating room while Dan weeps. A surgeon lifts Tim's heart and passes it to a colleague. Dr. Briar and her team operate on Emily, and a medic brings Tim's heart in a stainless steel bowl. Emily lies anesthetized on the operating table. A dream-like image shows Emily and Tim under a tree, entwining fingers. Emily's new heart lies still as Dr. Briar watches the flat-lining monitor. The heart starts beating, and Emily lies peacefully, eyes closed. Ben sits in Tim's motel room, staring at a wall of newspaper cuttings about the crash, photos of people Tim helped, and an article on Ezra. Ben sifts through envelopes with names of people Tim wanted to help, including his own. He gives Emily a list on the back of a photo of Sarah and Tim at Holly's bedside. Emily weeps in her garden, reading Tim's letter. In a bathtub, Emily submerges herself, listening with eyes closed. She later walks in a park, approaches a children's choir, and watches Ezra play piano. When the songs end, Ezra directs applause to the choir, bows, and gestures again. Emily watches, her eyes wide and gentle. Ezra confidently acknowledges her; he's no longer blind. Emily's eyes fill with tears as Ezra smiles. They exchange smiles, and tears roll down Emily's cheeks as Ezra shakes her hand incredulously.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Emily, on a gurney, is wheeled to the operating room where Dr. Briar performs surgery. Tim's heart is passed in a stainless steel bowl, and Emily, anesthetized, lies on the table. A dream-like image shows Emily and Tim entwined under a tree. Dr. Briar observes the flat-lining monitor until the heart beats, leaving Emily at peace. Ben, in Tim’s motel room, sifts through envelopes for people Tim helped, including himself. He gives Emily a list on the back of a photo. In her garden, Emily cries over Tim's letter. She lies in a bathtub, submerging herself to listen. In a park, Emily watches a children's choir with Ezra, who is now sighted. As Ezra acknowledges the choir, Emily, moved, approaches him. They exchange emotional glances, and she smiles through tears, which roll down her cheeks.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: A small, uncovered square of his chest is visible beneath a crisp, white sheet as Emily is wheeled rather swiftly down the stark and sterile corridor of a bustling hospital on a sturdy gurney. Dr. Briar arrives to check on her in the bright, well-equipped operating room, while nearby, Dan is visibly emotional and tears stream down his face. At this critical moment, a skilled surgeon carefully lifts Tim's heart from the open cavity of his body and gently passes it, with great care and precision, to a waiting colleague. Meanwhile, Dr. Briar and her dedicated team are intensely focused on operating on Emily, as a medic opens the heavy door of the operating room to allow another medic to enter, carrying Tim's heart safely contained in a gleaming stainless steel bowl. Emily, who is deeply anesthetized and wearing a snug theater cap, lies still on the operating table, oblivious to the flurry of medical activity around her. In a golden, dream-like vision, Emily and Tim are seated serenely under the comforting shade of a large tree, their fingers softly intertwined, as if capturing a moment of pure tranquility. Emily's newly transplanted heart remains motionless in the exposed cavity of her chest, while Dr. Briar intently monitors the flat-lining screen. Suddenly, the heart begins to pulsate with life, and Emily remains peacefully motionless on the operating table, her eyes gently closed in repose. Meanwhile, the real Ben sits despondently in Tim's somber motel room, his gaze fixed on a wall filled with newspaper cuttings about the tragic crash. Alongside are photographs of the individuals Tim wished to help, as well as an article dedicated to Ezra. Ben meticulously sorts through several envelopes, each inscribed with the name of someone Tim intended to assist, including Ben himself. Ben then hands Emily a detailed list of names written thoughtfully on the back of a cherished photo of Sarah and another photo depicting Tim standing solemnly at Holly's hospital bedside. Seated in her garden, surrounded by nature, Emily weeps as she reads the heartfelt letter Tim wrote to her. Feeling glum and pensive, she relaxes in a bathtub, the water framing her head and shoulders like a reflective, calming embrace. Emily slowly immerses herself, allowing her ears to dip beneath the water's surface, lying still with her eyes closed, simply listening to the muffled sounds. In a light, delicate summer dress, Emily strolls through a sunny park, approaching where a cheerful children's choir is performing in the open air to an audience of adults who clap enthusiastically along with the melody. Ezra is at the piano, filling the air with beautiful music, and Emily watches from the crowd, her emotions deeply moved by the scene. As the songs conclude, Ezra directs the audience's standing ovation toward the choir, rises gracefully, bows, and then gestures appreciatively to the talented young singers once more. Emily, watching with wide, gentle eyes, follows Ezra with her gaze, craning her neck to keep him in sight as he leaves the stage and moves effortlessly among the audience members. Emily makes her way over to Ezra as he stops briefly to chat with some of the children. Ezra turns to face her with newfound confidence; he is no longer blind. Emily shakes her head gently as her eyes begin to fill with tears that glisten in the light. She nods slowly and blinks back the tears, witnessing the light dawning in Ezra's eyes. A gentle smile spreads across his face, and Emily smiles back through her tears, which roll steadily down her cheeks. Ezra looks at her with incredulous joy and shakes her hand warmly, while another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek, marking the moment with profound emotion.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: A small, uncovered square of his bare chest is visible beneath a crisp, pristine white sheet as Emily is wheeled rather swiftly down the stark and sterile corridor of a bustling, busy hospital, lying on a sturdy, reliable gurney. Dr. Briar arrives promptly to check on her in the bright, well-lit, and well-equipped operating room, while nearby, Dan is visibly emotional, his face marked by the steady stream of tears cascading down his cheeks. At this highly critical moment, a skilled and experienced surgeon carefully lifts Tim's heart from the open cavity of his body and gently passes it, with great care and precision, to a waiting colleague. Meanwhile, Dr. Briar and her dedicated team are intensely focused, concentrating all their expertise on operating on Emily, as a medic opens the heavy door of the operating room to allow another medic to enter, carrying Tim's heart safely contained within a gleaming stainless steel bowl. Emily, who is deeply anesthetized and wearing a snug, fitted theater cap, lies quietly still on the operating table, completely oblivious to the flurry of intense medical activity swirling around her. In a golden, dream-like vision, Emily and Tim appear seated serenely under the comforting shade of a large, expansive tree, their fingers softly intertwined, as if capturing a moment of pure, undisturbed tranquility. Emily's newly transplanted heart remains motionless in the exposed cavity of her chest, while Dr. Briar intently monitors the unwaveringly flat-lining screen. Suddenly, and almost miraculously, the heart begins to pulsate with life, and Emily remains peacefully motionless on the operating table, her eyes gently closed in repose. Meanwhile, the real Ben sits despondently in Tim's somber, dimly lit motel room, his gaze fixed on a wall filled with a collage of newspaper cuttings about the tragic crash. Alongside these are photographs of the individuals Tim wished to help, as well as an article thoughtfully dedicated to Ezra. Ben meticulously sorts through several envelopes, each inscribed with the name of someone Tim intended to assist, including Ben himself. Ben then hands Emily a detailed list of names written thoughtfully on the back of a cherished and treasured photo of Sarah, and another photo depicting Tim standing solemnly at Holly's hospital bedside. Seated in her garden, surrounded by the gentle presence of nature, Emily weeps as she reads the heartfelt letter Tim wrote personally to her. Feeling glum and deeply pensive, she relaxes in a bathtub, the water framing her head and shoulders like a reflective, calming embrace. Emily slowly immerses herself, allowing her ears to dip beneath the water’s surface, lying still with her eyes softly closed, simply listening to the muffled, soothing sounds. In a light, delicate summer dress, Emily strolls slowly through a sunny, verdant park, approaching where a cheerful children's choir is performing in the open air to an audience of adults who enthusiastically clap along with the joyful melody. Ezra is at the piano, skillfully filling the air with beautiful, harmonious music, and Emily watches intently from the crowd, her emotions deeply moved by the touching scene. As the songs conclude, Ezra directs the audience’s enthusiastic standing ovation toward the talented choir, rises gracefully, bows with respect, and then gestures appreciatively to the talented young singers once more. Emily, watching with wide, gentle eyes, follows Ezra with her gaze, craning her neck to keep him in sight as he leaves the raised stage and moves effortlessly among the captivated audience members. Emily makes her way over to Ezra as he stops briefly to chat with some of the children. Ezra turns to face her with newfound, radiant confidence; he is no longer blind. Emily shakes her head gently as her eyes begin to fill with tears that glisten in the light. She nods slowly and blinks back the tears, witnessing the light dawning brightly in Ezra's eyes. A gentle smile spreads warmly across his face, and Emily smiles back through her tears, which roll steadily down her cheeks. Ezra looks at her with incredulous joy and shakes her hand warmly, while another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek, marking the moment with profound, heartfelt emotion.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: A patch of his chest exposed beneath a sheet creates a stark visual as Emily is wheeled down a brightly-lit hospital corridor on a gurney. She is transported with careful efficiency toward the operating room, where Dr. Briar soon arrives to see her. Meanwhile, Dan, overcome with emotion, is weeping, possibly in the corridor or a nearby waiting area. In a critical, life-saving procedure, a surgeon meticulously lifts Tim's heart out of his body, carefully ensuring its safety as it is passed to a colleague standing nearby with steady hands. In the operating room, Dr. Briar and her team are intensely focused on keeping Emily stable for her transplant. At this moment, a medic pushes open the door of the operating room, creating a brief influx of cool air, as another medic enters carrying Tim's heart in a gleaming stainless steel bowl, signaling the next vital step of the surgery. Emily, under the effects of anesthesia and wearing a sterile theater cap, lies motionless on the operating table, seemingly suspended in time. Her consciousness seems to drift into a serene, golden-hued dream, where she and Tim sit under the soothing shade of a tree, their fingers entwined in a moment of deeper connection. As the surgery progresses, Emily's new heart lies inert in the open cavity of her chest, with Dr. Briar's eyes fixed on a monitor that is ominously flat-lining. There is a tense pause, a breath held in suspense, until the heart begins its rhythmic beating, a sign of life and hope, as Emily remains peacefully unconscious on the table, her eyes gently closed. In a contrasting scene, the real Ben is seated in Tim's dimly lit motel room, exuding a palpable misery as he stares at a wall plastered with newspaper cuttings recounting the crash. Amidst the collage are photos of individuals Tim had touched with his kindness, including an article about Ezra. Ben cautiously sifts through a stack of envelopes, each inscribed with the name of someone Tim wanted to help, his own name included among them. Later, Ben hands Emily a carefully curated list of these people, written on the back of a photo of Sarah, alongside another photo depicting Tim standing solemnly by Holly's hospital bedside. Out in her garden, surrounded by nature's quiet solace, Emily is overcome with emotion, tears cascading down her face as she reads Tim's heartfelt letter to her, the words resonating deeply within her. Feeling glum and pensive, Emily reclines in her bathtub, her head and shoulders subtly framed by the water's gentle ripple. She allows herself to sink slowly beneath the surface until her ears are submerged, creating an intimate cocoon of muted sound where she lies with eyes closed, attuning to the profound silence and inner reflection. Emerging from her solitude, Emily, now adorned in a delicate summer dress, meanders through a sun-drenched park where a children's choir fills the air with joyous song, performing to an audience of adults who clap rhythmically along. Ezra is at the piano, his musical prowess on full display, and Emily watches, visibly moved by the scene. As the final notes linger, and the songs reach their heartfelt conclusion, Ezra points the applause enthusiastically toward the choir, rises from his seat, bows with a nod of appreciation, and gestures to acknowledge the choir's performance once more. Emily remains transfixed, her gentle eyes wide, as she cranes her neck to follow Ezra's movements through the crowd with assured grace. She makes her way over to him, catching him as he exchanges warm greetings with some children in passing. Turning to face her with newfound confidence and clarity, Ezra reveals he is no longer bound by blindness. Emily, overwhelmed by emotion, shakes her head faintly, tears beginning to well in her eyes. She nods slightly, her tears glistening as she blinks them back, witnessing the light that dawns in Ezra's eyes. He responds with a gentle smile, mirroring Emily's, as tears cascade down her cheeks. Ezra regards her in disbelief, shaking her hand with a sense of wonderment, while another solitary tear traces a path down Emily's cheek, marking a moment of profound connection.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Emily is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney, partially covered by a sheet, as Dr. Briar arrives to see her in the operating room, where an emotional Dan weeps nearby. During the operation, a surgeon carefully transfers Tim's heart to a colleague, and it is brought into the room in a stainless steel bowl. As anesthetized Emily lies on the table, a dream-like image of her and Tim under a tree appears. Dr. Briar watches the monitor flat-line before Emily's new heart begins to beat, leaving her peacefully resting on the operating table. Meanwhile, Ben broods in Tim's motel room, surrounded by newspaper cuttings, photos of those Tim helped, and an article on Ezra. He sorts through envelopes bearing the names of people Tim intended to help, including his own. Ben later gives Emily a list of names written on a photo's back, featuring Sarah and Tim at Holly's bedside. In her garden, Emily weeps over Tim's letter. In a reflective mood, she lies in a bathtub, submerges herself, and listens with eyes closed. Later, wearing a summer dress, Emily strolls through a sunny park to watch a children's choir perform, with Ezra playing the piano. She is moved by the performance and applauds with the audience. As Ezra gestures to the choir and bows before departing the stage, Emily keeps her eyes on him. She approaches him as he converses with the children, noticing his newfound confidence and restored sight. Emily, overwhelmed, shakes her head with tears glistening in her eyes. She nods as Ezra's eyes light up with realization; they exchange smiles, and Emily's tears flow as Ezra gazes at her in disbelief, shaking her hand while another tear rolls down her cheek.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: A square of his chest is bare beneath a sheet as Emily, who requires a critical heart transplant due to her failing heart, is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney. Dr. Briar, a renowned cardiac surgeon known for pioneering advanced heart transplant techniques, comes to see her in an operating room, and Dan, overwhelmed by the gravity of the situation, weeps. A surgeon lifts Tim's heart, donated following a tragic accident, out of his body and carefully passes it to a colleague with steady hands and solemnity. Dr. Briar and her colleagues are operating on Emily as a medic opens the door of the operating room to let in another medic who is carrying Tim's heart in a stainless steel bowl, kept viable by a state-of-the-art portable heart preservation system. Emily, anesthetized and wearing a theater cap that signifies sterile conditions, lies on the operating table. There is a golden, dream-like image of Emily and Tim sitting in the shade of the tree where they had their first heartfelt conversation and entwining their fingers, symbolizing an unending connection. Emily's new heart lies still in the open cavity of her chest while Dr. Briar looks up at the monitor, which is flat-lining, a heart-stopping moment that requires swift intervention. The heart begins to beat, and Emily lies peacefully on the operating table, eyes closed, a testament to modern medical miracles. The real Ben sits miserably in Tim's motel room, a stark space filled with memories, staring at a wall of newspaper cuttings about the crash that claimed Tim's life. There are also photos of the people Tim helped, highlighting his legacy of generosity, and an article on Ezra, who was blind before a recent corneal transplant. Ben sifts through envelopes, each of which has the name of a person Tim wanted to help, fulfilling Tim's final wishes, including Ben's. Ben hands Emily a list of the people written on the back of a photo of Sarah, Tim's sister, and a photo showing Tim standing at Holly's hospital bedside, one of his last acts of kindness. In her garden, Emily, now recovering, weeps as she reads Tim's letter to her, a heartfelt message that reveals his deep affection and hopes for her future. Glum and pensive, Emily lies in a bathtub, and her head and shoulders are framed by the water, a moment of introspection and solace. Emily slowly submerges herself so that her ears are beneath the water and lies with her eyes closed, listening to the soothing calm. Wearing a delicate summer dress, Emily walks in a sunny park known for its vibrant community events and approaches a children's choir singing in the open to an audience of adults who clap along with joy. Ezra, a once-blind musician whose sight was restored through a corneal transplant, is playing the piano, and Emily watches and looks moved, recognizing the beauty and hope in his music. When the songs ended, Ezra points the audience's standing applause towards the choir and rises, bows, then gestures to the choir again, acknowledging the young talents. Emily watches intensely through wide, gentle eyes, deeply touched by the resilience around her, and cranes her neck to keep track of Ezra as he leaves the stage and moves effortlessly towards members of the audience. Emily walks over to Ezra as he chats to some of the children in passing. He turns to her confidently; he's no longer blind, a fact that amazes both of them. Emily shakes her head, her eyes begin to fill with tears and glisten with a mix of sadness and joy. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes, a metaphorical and literal awakening. He smiles gently, and Emily smiles through her tears, which roll down her cheeks, symbols of release and relief. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand, and another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek, marking the beginning of a new chapter for both.

A surgeon lifts Tim's heart out of his body and carefully passes it to a colleague. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In her garden Emily weeps as she reads Tim's letter to her. Glum and pensive Emily lies in a bathtub and her head and shoulders are framed by the water. Emily slowly submerges herself so that her ears are beneath the water and lies with her eyes closed listening. Wearing a delicate summer dress Emily walks in a sunny park and approaches a children's choir singing in the open to an audience of adults who clap along. Ezra is playing the piano and Emily watches and looks moved. When the songs ended Ezra points the audience's standing applause towards the choir and rises bows then gestures to the choir again. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes. He smiles gently and Emily smiles through her tears which roll down her cheeks. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand and another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek.

High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. In her garden Emily weeps as she reads Tim's letter to her. Glum and pensive Emily lies in a bathtub and her head and shoulders are framed by the water. Emily slowly submerges herself so that her ears are beneath the water and lies with her eyes closed listening. Wearing a delicate summer dress Emily walks in a sunny park and approaches a children's choir singing in the open to an audience of adults who clap along. Ezra is playing the piano and Emily watches and looks moved. When the songs ended Ezra points the audience's standing applause towards the choir and rises bows then gestures to the choir again. Emily watches intensely through wide gentle eyes and cranes her neck to keep track of Ezra as he leaves the stage and moves effortlessly towards members of the audience. Emily walks over to Ezra as he chats to some of the children in passing. He turns to her confidently he is no longer blind. Emily shakes her head her eyes begin to fill with tears and glisten. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes. He smiles gently and Emily smiles through her tears which roll down her cheeks. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand and another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: A square of his chest is bare beneath a sheet as Emily is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney. Dr Briar comes to see her in an operating room and Dan weeps. A surgeon lifts Tim's heart out of his body and carefully passes it to a colleague. Dr Briar and her colleagues are operating on Emily as a medic opens the door of the operating room to let in another medic who is carrying Tim's heart in a stainless steel bowl. Emily anesthetized and wearing a theater cap lies on the operating table. There is a golden dreamlike image of Emily and Tim sitting in the shade of the tree and entwining their fingers. Emily watches intensely through wide gentle eyes and cranes her neck to keep track of Ezra as he leaves the stage and moves effortlessly towards members of the audience. Emily walks over to Ezra as he chats to some of the children in passing. He turns to her confidently he is no longer blind. Emily shakes her head her eyes begin to fill with tears and glisten. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes. He smiles gently and Emily smiles through her tears which roll down her cheeks. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand and another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: A square of his chest is bare beneath a sheet as Emily is wheeled down a hospital corridor on a gurney. Dr Briar comes to see her in an operating room and Dan weeps. Emily nods and blinks back tears as light dawns in Ezra's eyes. He smiles gently and Emily smiles through her tears which roll down her cheeks. Ezra gazes at her incredulously and shakes her hand and another big tear rolls down Emily's cheek.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A slice of his ankle is exposed beneath a blanket as Alice is rolled down a school hallway on a skateboard. Professor Maple comes to greet her in a classroom, and Jack laughs. A gardener lifts Jim's tulip out of its pot and gingerly passes it to a neighbor. Professor Maple and her teammates are gardening around Alice as a chef swings open the gate of the classroom to let in another chef who is holding Jim's tulip in a wooden crate. Alice, dozing and wearing a wizard hat, reclines on the school desk. There is a silver, whimsical vision of Alice and Jim lounging under a hammock and braiding their hair. Alice's new tulip rests motionless in the open pot of her garden while Professor Maple glances up at the clock, which is ticking. The tulip starts to bloom, and Alice sits calmly at the school desk, eyes closed. The actual Chris lounges comfortably in Jim's gym locker, admiring a wall of comic book pages about the storm. There are also sketches of the animals Jim rescued and a feature on Oscar. Chris sorts through postcards, each of which has the name of a creature Jim intended to save, including Chris's. Chris hands Alice a map of the animals drawn on the back of a sketch of Lucy and a sketch depicting Jim napping at Mina's castle window. In her kitchen, Alice giggles as she reads Jim's message to her. Cheerful and reflective, Alice floats in a swimming pool, and her feet and elbows are framed by the sky. Alice gradually sinks herself so that her toes are beneath the waves and rests with her eyes shut, listening. Wearing a cozy winter coat, Alice strolls in a foggy forest and approaches a bird chorus chirping publicly to a crowd of trees who sway along. Oscar is strumming a harp, and Alice listens and appears touched. When the melodies concluded, Oscar directs the forest's branching applause towards the chorus and stands, bows, then signals to the chorus again. Alice observes intensely through large, soft eyes and tilts her head to follow Oscar as he exits the clearing and moves gracefully towards trunks of the trees. Alice walks over to Oscar as he talks to some of the birds nearby. He faces her confidently; he's no longer mute. Alice shakes her head, her eyes begin to fill with laughter and shimmer. Alice nods and suppresses laughter as warmth sparks in Oscar's eyes. He smiles softly, and Alice grins through her laughter, which trickles down her cheeks. Oscar stares at her in disbelief and pats her shoulder, and another big laugh rolls down Alice's cheek.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Emily is wheeled into surgery as Dr. Briar and her team prepare for her heart transplant, using Tim's heart. A dream-like image shows Emily and Tim under a tree. The new heart starts beating, and Emily lies peacefully. Meanwhile, Ben sits in Tim's motel, surrounded by clippings about the crash and people Tim intended to help, including Ben. Ben gives Emily a list of these people, along with photos. In her garden, Emily reads Tim's letter and weeps. Later, she submerges herself in a bathtub, listening quietly. Emily walks in a park, approaching a choir with Ezra playing the piano. Moved by the music, she watches as Ezra, now no longer blind, interacts confidently with the audience. Emily, emotional, shakes Ezra’s hand, tears rolling down her cheeks as they share a hopeful moment.
